definitions.definition: A cut of beef from the lower part of the back, where the last ribs are (called rump in UK English).
A cut of beef from the middle of the back (corresponding to short loin and partly rib in US English).

main_definition: ( US ) A cut of beef from the lower part of the back, where the last ribs are (called rump in UK English).
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) A cut of beef from the middle of the back (corresponding to short loin and partly rib in US English).
